alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued October 06 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THE POLK COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR SONNI RAY MEILIKE, WHITE, FEMALE, 2 WEEK OLD, 19 INCHES, 8 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BLUE EYE COLOR, LAST SEEN WEARING PINK SHIRT AND DIAPER. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR SYLVIA NICOLE NORMAN, 31 YEARS OLD, WHITE, FEMALE, 5 FEET 1 INCH, 115 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BLUE EYES AND WHITE SHIRT WITH BLUE SHORTS AND WHITE LEGGINGS UNDERNEATH. HAS TATTOOS ON BACK AND LEFT ARM. IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE POLK COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE AT 9 3 6 3 2 7 6 8 1 0. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS POLK COUNTY SHERIFFS AT 9 3 6 3 2 7 6 8 1 0.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler
